divs: Sighting DetailsI was 12 years old I was in the car with my older sister and her boyfriend at that time. We had parked along side of the road in front of our home. My sister and her boyfriend were talking and I was looking out the window of the car and when I seen somthing in the night sky that I had never seen befor.We had lived at that address for six years,so I new the night skys there.The craft seem to be over the Army Base in Abberdeen, MD. The craft was in the sky with a beam of light comming down from it. I will always remember it. If you have any questions contact me. There all so a time when I was 3 years old my Mother and my Brother and sister said they saw a cigar shape object over my Father house in Baltimore, MD.
Summary: Silver Disc In shape with a beam of light comming down from it ,
